tag_professor: Respected (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Caring (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Harris is the best teacher I have at Hastings. He helps with EVERY aspect of being a law student, and he makes class extremely enjoyable. He knows pretty much everything about every subject in law, and he gives clarity to seemingly impossible-to-understand subjects. I always feel relieved when leaving his class.

stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  RESPECTED
comments: Harris cares. He cares about each and every one of his students . DO NOT BE LATE. He teaches you- no he GIVES you the answer on how to do well on your first 1L year. He not only teaches LWR but gives you skills (and inspiration, motivation, etc.) to do better than everyone else in your section and in your year. He is not easy though beware.
